packageJSON.name: Kimochi
packageJSON.copyright: Copyright (C) 2015 Kimochi, Inc. All rights reserved.

commit.message: first try at grunt windows installer

releases.name: v0.9.3
releases.body: - rollforward to v0.9.1 due to issues showing store/library in v0.9.2

releases.name: v0.9.2
releases.body: - load products after login because products API now requires authentication since the server filters out disabled products that you own (such as DSOL)

releases.name: v0.9.1
releases.body: - client now quits for original squirrel events

releases.name: v0.9.0
releases.body: -remove new setup links from login page

releases.name: v0.8.5: starter-kit End of Line
releases.body:
-No longer auto-updates from blob.kimochi.co via Squirrel
-Includes links on login page to download the new kimochi launcher
-Restores shortcut to launch dev tools

releases.name: v0.8.4
releases.body:
- update electron-rebuild
- using npm shrinkwrap to lock down all dependency versions
- images now fit to size
- increase font weight for context text
- unregister all global keyboard shortcuts
- allow text selection

releases.name: v0.8.3
releases.body:
- include react-stripe-checkout monkeypatch into git
- downgrade react-slick to 0.7.2 so carousels start working again

releases.name: v0.8.2
releases.body:
- disable react-slick because of versioning issues
- monkeypatched react-stripe-checkout (but not checked into git!) to prevent remote stripe asset fetching every render

releases.name: v0.8.1
releases.body: - upgrade electron to 0.34.2

releases.name: v0.8.0
releases.body:
- content action button keeps disabled state even when navigating away
- can choose new library directory via settings page
- tags show underneath product description

releases.name: v0.7.1
releases.body: - bug fix for missing desktop shortcut

releases.name: v0.7.0
releases.body:
- publisher information is populated by graphQL API
- products with image and video links now have a media carousel
- library tab shows owned products instead of installed products
- library and buy buttons are disabled while requests are in flight
- fix bug where autoupdate would remake desktop shortcut even if it was deleted
- content list item now has filesize
- store has categories based on new and featured tags

releases.name: v0.6.6
releases.body: - use querystring lib to create query strings so we don't run into URL encoding problems during login

releases.name: v0.6.5
releases.body:
- better amplitude logging with successful/unsuccessful purchases
- fix bug where expandAll was being called for every navbar component construction

releases.name: v0.6.4
releases.body:
- expandAll API only used if user is a publisher
- status copy when downloading is smaller to prevent content card resizing
- fix bug where disabled products show in the store for publisher users
- fix bug where homepage doesn't re-render when StoreStore gets updated

releases.name: v0.6.3
releases.body: - use new filetoken API flow

releases.name: v0.6.2
releases.body:
- fix login UI freezing issues
- fix navigation title to have more contrast

releases.name: v0.6.1
releases.body:
- add rpgmakerxp dependency
- migrate erroneous rpgmakerxpace dependency

releases.name: v0.6.0
releases.body:
- save login information
- fix HDoom launch bug
- navbar restyle
- add game request button
- add bug report button
- primary content shows first
- fix resizing issues on content list item and content action button
- add price to buy buttons
- freeze login UI when waiting on auth
- pretty print json for settings file
- markdown links to use external browser
- don't loggly actions that spam a lot

releases.name: v0.5.1
releases.body:
- content card changes: separate name and version
- product title redesign
- reset content status on navigation
- removed productactionbuttons

releases.name: v0.5.0
releases.body: - use content abstraction, updated product page UI

releases.name: v0.4.4
releases.body: - add olark

releases.name: v0.4.3
releases.body:
forgot to bump version again
- track buy flow events
- error message on declined stripe charge

releases.name: v0.4.2
releases.body:
forgot to check in version bump here!
- windows exes now run from product working directory
- don't send download progress actions to loggly

releases.name: v0.4.1
releases.body:
- remove extraneous console.logs
- log all actions to loggly
- fix null error with version names
- put in $ on buy button

releases.name: v0.4.0
releases.body:
- update flow
- rpgMakerVX dependency
- description Markdown support

releases.name: v0.3.0
releases.body:
- Builds and hot devs can be run against staging via env var
- Migration scaffolding
- Add to library, buy, download, play product button
- Stripe checkout button, live payments
- Refactor of the ProductPage component into Flux patterns
- Dispatcher always logs actions into console
- Uninstall button for games
Update swf dep to use Flash Player 18

- Fixed nuke settings not nuking settings.json
- Added confirmation dialog to nuke settings
- Fixed browse downloaded content not opening a folder
- Added announcement server
- Download requests now use authorization header

- complaint form
- install RPG Maker dependency
- refactor ProductService
- autoupdate to blobserver
- build with remote releases (deltas)
- use electron v0.30.2 specifically to build
- move kimochi-temp to kimochi-products
- move client state on file system to be in directory above app directory (state is preserved when squirrel updates)
- fix bug so settings.json can have more than one product
- settings page - nuke, browse library options
- publisher name is now a link
- fix bug where publisher name wasn't showing
- environment can be set to staging, will point to staging URLs
